title: assistance in who i should get
body: hello, I've been playing a lot recently and i just looked at my IP and gone "wow, i'm a 5819, almost 6300!" but now i'm stuck on who i should get. Who _should_ i get? I'm looking for a more fun champion to play.

replies.body:
if u want a powerful team fight adc twitch, or heavy damge adc vayne or good early game one lucian or maybe jhin idk

soz only adc from me
